text: The Bell Ringer's Daughter () is a 1906 French silent movie directed by Albert CapellaniLa fille du sonneur and stars Gabriel Moreau, Renée Coge, and Ransart. ==Actors== * Gabriel Moreau as The Lover * Renée Coge as The Bell Ringer's Daughter * Ransart as The Bell Ringer's Granddaughter ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1906 movies Category:French silent movies
title: The Bell Ringer's Daughter
